description: This RFP cancels and supersedes previous RFP solicitation number Doc3791394853 dated 2022-12-15 with a closing of 2023-01-10 at 14:00 EDT.
full_summary:
================================
### Government Tender Announcement: Hard Drive Shredder

#### Solicitation Number
WS3787173918

#### Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) solicits bids for the supply of a Hard Drive Shredder. The procurement is being undertaken by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Tender Details

* Date of Publication: February 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: March 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: March 10, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 10, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2023

#### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)

No GSIN is assigned for this procurement.

#### United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)

* UNSPSC Code: 
  + 23000000 - Industrial Manufacturing and Processing Machinery and Accessories
  + 44102913 - Compact disc destroyer

#### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity

No specific region is designated for this procurement.

#### Regions of Delivery

The goods are to be delivered to Ontario (except the National Capital Region).

#### Bid Submission

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Stanley Chui, SPAC/PSPC
Email: stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Please ensure that all bid submissions conform to the requirements outlined in the tender documents. Failure to comply may result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department reserves the right to cancel or reject any bid, in whole or in part, at any time, without notice or explanation.
